info.author: finklabs
info.description:
|License| |GitHub issues|

We run SQL queries on AWS Athena from jupyter notebooks
=======================================================

.. figure:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/finklabs/jupyter-athena-sql/develop/docs/images/jupyter-in-action.png
   :alt: athena.ipynb

   athena.ipynb

run the notebook
================

I like using jupyterlab but other notebooks should work, too

.. code:: bash

    $ jupyter lab

this should open the notebook in your browser. just click on
``athena.ipynb``.

see also
========

similar libs I found:

-  https://github.com/catherinedevlin/ipython-sql
-  https://github.com/pivotal/sql\_magic
